snippet: Abdulrahman Zeitoun, the subject of a best-selling book, was charged with plotting to have his wife, her son and another man murdered.
abstract: New Orleans police arrest Abdulrahman Zeitoun, charging him with plotting to have his ex wife Kathy Zeitoun, their son and another man murdered; Zeitoun had been widely regarded as a hero for his rescue efforts during Hurricane Katrina.
lead_paragraph: Abdulrahman Zeitoun, the subject of a best-selling book, was charged with plotting to have his wife, her son and another man murdered.

headline.seo: Celebrated Hero in ‘Zeitoun’ Book Faces Murder Charges in New Orleans
headline.main: Katrina Hero Facing Charges in New Orleans
headline.print_headline: Katrina Hero Facing Charges In New Orleans
